public class FileDeleteFilter implements Filter {
    @Override
    public void doFilter(Context ctx, FilterChain chain) throws Throwable {

            //æ‰¹é‡åˆªé™¤è‡¨æ™‚æ–‡ä»¶
            for (List<UploadedFile> files : ctx.filesMap().values()) {

        }
    }
}
